- [93mScientific[0m [93mproduction[0m in [93mNutrition[0m in the [93mJournal[0m [93mCiência[0m & [93mSaúde[0m [93mColetiva[0m ([93m2020[0m-[93m2024[0m).: This [93marticle[0m [93maimed[0m to [93manalyze[0m the [93mscientific[0m [93mproduction[0m of the [93mJournal[0m [93mCiência[0m & [93mSaúde[0m [93mColetiva[0m ([93mC[0m&[93mSC[0m) in the [93marea[0m of [93mfood[0m and [93mnutrition[0m ([93mF[0m&[93mN[0m) from [93m2020[0m to [93m2024[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mconducted[0m a [93mnarrative[0m [93mreview[0m of the [93marticles[0m [93mpublished[0m in the [93mperiod[0m, and the [93mpublications[0m were [93mentered[0m into a [93mMicrosoft[0m [93mExcel[0m® [93mspreadsheet[0m to [93mextract[0m [93mbibliometric[0m [93mcharacteristics[0m. The [93mdata[0m are [93mpresented[0m in [93mfrequency[0m [93mdistribution[0m [93mtables[0m. [93mSixty[0m-[93msix[0m [93marticles[0m were [93mpublished[0m in the [93m2020[0m-[93m2024[0m [93mperiod[0m, whose [93mthemes[0m were [93mFood[0m [93mConsumption[0m ([93m33[0m.[93m3[0m%), [93mF[0m&[93mN[0m [93mPolicies[0m and [93mPrograms[0m ([93m24[0m.[93m2[0m%), [93mNutritional[0m [93mStatus[0m [93mAssessment[0m ([93m22[0m.[93m7[0m%), [93mEnvironment[0m and [93mFood[0m [92mSystem[0m ([93m13[0m.[93m6[0m%), [93mFood[0m [93mTechnology[0m and [93mLabeling[0m ([93m3[0m.[93m0[0m%), [93mComplementary[0m [94mFeeding[0m ([93m1[0m.[93m5[0m%) and [93mFood[0m and [93mNutrition[0m [93mEducation[0m ([93m1[0m.[93m5[0m%). [93mComparing[0m the [93mpercentage[0m [93mdistribution[0m of [93mtopics[0m with the [93mreview[0m of [93mC[0m&[93mSC[0m [93mpublications[0m between [93m1996[0m and [93m2019[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mobserved[0m an [93mincrease[0m in [93mstudies[0m on [93mFood[0m [93mConsumption[0m, A&[93mN[0m [93mPolicies[0m and [93mPrograms[0m, a [93mdecrease[0m in [93marticles[0m on [93mNutritional[0m [93mStatus[0m [93mAssessment[0m, [93mComplementary[0m [94mFeeding[0m, and [93mFood[0m and [93mNutrition[0m [93mEducation[0m, and a [93mlack[0m of [93mstudies[0m on [93mBreastfeeding[0m. [93mNew[0m [93mareas[0m of [93minterest[0m [93memerged[0m, [93msuch[0m as [93mFood[0m [93mEnvironment[0m and [93mFood[0m [93mTechnology[0m and [93mLabeling[0m.
- [93mTrend[0m of [93mmalaria[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m among [93mpregnant[0m [93mwomen[0m, [93mSavannah[0m [93mRegion[0m, [93mGhana[0m, [93m2018[0m-[93m2022[0m.: [93mBackground[0m: [93mMalaria[0m in [93mpregnancy[0m ([93mMiP[0m) [93mremains[0m a [93mserious[0m [93mpublic[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mproblem[0m [93mdue[0m to its [93madverse[0m [93meffects[0m on [93mmaternal[0m [93mhealth[0m, [93mpregnancy[0m [93moutcomes[0m, and the [93mcost[0m of [93mhealthcare[0m [93mdelivery[0m. [93mSignificant[0m [93msuccesses[0m [93mhave[0m been [93machieved[0m in [93mcontrolling[0m [93mmalaria[0m [93mglobally[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mlittle[0m is [93mknown[0m about the [93mprogress[0m [93mmade[0m in [93mcontrolling[0m [93mmalaria[0m in [93mpregnancy[0m in the [93mSavannah[0m [93mRegion[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mdescribed[0m the [93mtrend[0m of the [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m in the [93mSavannah[0m [93mRegion[0m of [93mGhana[0m from [93m2018[0m to [93m2022[0m. [93mMethods[0m: The [93mstudy[0m [93memployed[0m a [93mretrospective[0m, [93mdescriptive[0m, [93mcross[0m-[93msectional[0m [93mstudy[0m [93musing[0m [93mdata[0m from [93m2018[0m to [93m2022[0m. [93mData[0m on [93mmalaria[0m in [93mpregnancy[0m in the [93mSavannah[0m [93mRegion[0m was [93mextracted[0m from the [93mDHIMS[0m [93m2[0m [93mdatabase[0m and [93mtransferred[0m into [93mMicrosoft[0m [93mExcel[0m [93mversion[0m [93m19[0m. [93mDescriptive[0m [93mstatistical[0m [93manalyses[0m were [93mdone[0m. [93mResults[0m were [93msummarised[0m into [93mfrequencies[0m and [93mpercentages[0m and [93mpresented[0m in [93mtables[0m, [93mgraphs[0m, and [93mmaps[0m. [93mResults[0m: [93mOverall[0m, the [93mMiP[0m [93mtesting[0m [93mrate[0m was [93m90[0m.[93m8[0m% ([93m46[0m,[93m734[0m/[93m51[0m,[93m479[0m) and [93m54[0m.[93m5[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m54[0m.[93m0[0m-[93m55[0m.[93m0[0m) of [93mpregnant[0m [93mwomen[0m [93mtested[0m [93mpositive[0m. The [93mmajority[0m, [93m68[0m.[93m0[0m%, of [93mMiP[0m [93mcases[0m in the [93mregion[0m were [93mmothers[0m [93maged[0m [93m20[0m-[93m34[0m [93myears[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m was [93mhighest[0m among [93mmothers[0m [93maged[0m below [93m20[0m [93myears[0m, [93m59[0m.[93m3[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m58[0m.[93m1[0m-[93m60[0m.[93m6[0m). [93mBole[0m [93mDistrict[0m [93mhad[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m, [93m70[0m.[93m1[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m69[0m.[93m3[0m-[93m70[0m.[93m8[0m) and [93maccounted[0m for [93m40[0m.[93m5[0m% ([93m10[0m,[93m315[0m/[93m25[0m,[93m463[0m) of [93mall[0m [93mMiP[0m [93mcases[0m. [93mThere[0m was a [93mdecline[0m in the [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m from [93m2018[0m to [93m2022[0m from [93m60[0m.[93m4[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m59[0m.[93m3[0m-[93m61[0m.[93m5[0m) to [93m51[0m.[93m6[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m50[0m.[93m7[0m-[93m52[0m.[93m6[0m). [93mConclusion[0m: The [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m in the [93mSavannah[0m [93mRegion[0m is [93mhigh[0m, with [93mdisparities[0m among [93mDistricts[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mthere[0m is an [93mapparent[0m [93mdecline[0m over the [93mstudy[0m [93mperiod[0m. [93mThere[0m is a [93mneed[0m to [93mstrengthen[0m [93mexisting[0m [93mmalaria[0m [93mprevention[0m [93minterventions[0m in [93mpregnancy[0m, [93msuch[0m as the [93muse[0m of [93mSP[0m for [93mIPTp[0m and [93mITNs[0m to [93mprevent[0m [93mnegative[0m [93mmaternal[0m and [93mfetal[0m [93mbirth[0m [93moutcomes[0m. [93mPublic[0m [93mhealth[0m [93meducation[0m [93mprogrammes[0m [93mcould[0m [93mimprove[0m the [93muptake[0m and [93mutilisation[0m of [93mITNs[0m. [93mFurther[0m [93mresearch[0m [93mshould[0m be [93mconducted[0m to [93munravel[0m the [93mreasons[0m for the [93mdisproportionately[0m [93mhigh[0m [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m in the [93mBole[0m [93mDistrict[0m to [93menable[0m the [93mimplementation[0m of ([93mCNS[0m) in [93mJapan[0m from [93m2000[0m to [93m2020[0m. [93mMethods[0m: [93mMortality[0m [93mdata[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mCNS[0m [93mcancers[0m were [93mobtained[0m from the [93mWorld[0m [93mHealth[0m [93mOrganization[0m [93mMortality[0m [93mDatabase[0m. [93mYears[0m of [93mlife[0m [93mlost[0m ([93mYLL[0m) were [93mcalculated[0m [93musing[0m [93mage[0m-[93mstandardized[0m [93mmortality[0m [93mrates[0m [93madjusted[0m to the [93mWorld[0m [93mStandard[0m [93mPopulation[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mCNS[0m [93mcancers[0m [93mdeaths[0m [93mper[0m [93m100[0m,[93m000[0m [93mwomen[0m. [93mALSS[0m [93mresults[0m [93mindicated[0m that [93mmen[0m with [93mCNS[0m [93mmalignancies[0m [93mlost[0m [93m30[0m.[93m7[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m29[0m.[93m2[0m-[93m32[0m.[93m2[0m) of [93mtheir[0m [93mlifespan[0m in [93m2000[0m, and [93m24[0m.[93m3[0m% ([93m95[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m31[0m.[93m3[0m-[93m34[0m.[93m5[0m) to [93m25[0m.[93m2[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m24[0m.[93m1[0m-[93m26[0m.[93m3[0m) over the [93msame[0m - [93mSuicide[0m [93mdeaths[0m among [93mdentists[0m in the [93mUnited[0m [93mStates[0m.: [93mBackground[0m: [93mDentists[0m [93mexperience[0m [93mmyriad[0m [93moccupational[0m [93mstressors[0m and are [93mknown[0m to [93mhave[0m an [93melevated[0m [93mrisk[0m of [93msuicide[0m. [93mPrevious[0m [93mUS[0m [93mstudies[0m [93mfocused[0m on [93msuicide[0m among [93mWhite[0m [93mmale[0m [93mdentists[0m, and [93mall[0m [93mstudies[0m were [93mpublished[0m before [93m2000[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93maimed[0m to [93massess[0m [93msuicide[0m [93mmortality[0m among [93mmale[0m and [93mfemale[0m [93mUS[0m [93mdentists[0m, to [93mevaluate[0m [93mmethods[0m of [93msuicide[0m, and to [93mexamine[0m [93mtrends[0m over [93mtime[0m. [93mMethods[0m: [93mData[0m on [93mUS[0m [93mdentists[0m who [93mdied[0m from [93m1979[0m through [93m2018[0m were [93mprovided[0m by the [93mAmerican[0m [93mDental[0m [93mAssociation[0m and [93mmatched[0m to the [93mNational[0m [93mDeath[0m [93mIndex[0m. [93mDecedents[0m who [93mdied[0m by [93mintentional[0m [93mself[0m-[93mharm[0m were [93midentified[0m, and [93mproportionate[0m [93mmortality[0m [93mratios[0m ([93mPMRs[0m) [93mindirectly[0m [93mstandardized[0m for [93mage[0m, [93msex[0m, [93mrace[0m, and [93m5[0m-[93myear[0m [93mcalendar[0m [93mperiod[0m with [93m95[0m% [93mCIs[0m were [93mcalculated[0m [93musing[0m the [93mLife[0m [93mTable[0m [93mAnalysis[0m [92mSystem[0m ([93mNational[0m [93mInstitute[0m for [93mOccupational[0m [93mSafety[0m and [93mHealth[0m). [93mSuicide[0m [93mmethods[0m and [93mtrends[0m over [93mtime[0m were [93malso[0m [93manalyzed[0m. [93mResults[0m: Of [93m21[0m,[93m928[0m [93meligible[0m [93mdecedent[0m [93mrecords[0m, [93m475[0m ([93m2[0m.[93m2[0m%) [93mdeaths[0m were [93mcaused[0m by [93msuicide[0m, with [93mPMRs[0m of [93m2[0m.[93m01[0m ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m, [93m1[0m.[93m83[0m to [93m2[0m.[93m21[0m; [93mP[0m < .[93m001[0m) for [93mmale[0m [93mdentists[0m and [93m2[0m.[93m15[0m ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m, [93m1[0m.[93m23[0m to [93m3[0m.[93m49[0m; [93mP[0m = .[93m009[0m) for [93mfemale[0m [93mdentists[0m. [93mFirearms[0m were the [93mpredominant[0m [93msuicide[0m [93mmethod[0m for [93mmale[0m [93mdentists[0m ([93m61[0m.[93m4[0m%), but [93mfemale[0m [93mdentists[0m were [93msplit[0m between [93mfirearms[0m ([93m31[0m.[93m3[0m%) and [93mhangings[0m ([93m31[0m.[93m3[0m%). [93mPMRs[0m for [93msuicide[0m [93mincreased[0m [93msteadily[0m for [93mmale[0m and [93mfemale[0m [93mdentists[0m since [93m1995[0m. [93mConclusions[0m: From [93m1979[0m through [93m2018[0m, [93mUS[0m [93mmale[0m and [93mfemale[0m [93mdentists[0m [93mexhibited[0m [93mhigher[0m [93msuicide[0m [93mmortality[0m than the [93mgeneral[0m [93mpopulation[0m, with a [93msteady[0m [93mincrease[0m since [93m1995[0m. [93mPractical[0m [93mimplications[0m: [93mDentist[0m [93msuicide[0m [93mprevention[0m [93mresources[0m [93mmay[0m be [93mbeneficial[0m, [93mparticularly[0m [93maddressing[0m [93moccupational[0m [93mstressors[0m. [93mReducing[0m [93mstigma[0m and [93menhancing[0m [93maccess[0m to [93mmental[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mservices[0m [93mcould[0m [93mlessen[0m the [93mrisk[0m of [93msuicide[0m for [93mdental[0m [93mcare[0m [93mprofessionals[0m.
- [93mTrends[0m in [93mcompassionate[0m [93muse[0m of [93mmedicinal[0m [93mproducts[0m: [93mIsrael[0m [93m2020[0m-[93m2024[0m.: [93mBackground[0m: [93mCompassionate[0m [93muse[0m [93mprograms[0m [93mallow[0m [93mpatients[0m with [93mlife[0m-[93mthreating[0m and [93mserious[0m [93mconditions[0m to [93maccess[0m [93minvestigational[0m [93mtherapies[0m when [93mstandard[0m [93mtreatments[0m are [93minadequate[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93maims[0m to [93manalyze[0m the [93mtrends[0m and [93moutcomes[0m of the [93mcompassionate[0m [93muse[0m of [93mmedicinal[0m [93mproducts[0m in [93mIsrael[0m. [93mMethods[0m: [93mData[0m from the [93mIsraeli[0m [93mMinistry[0m of [93mHealth[0m'[93ms[0m [93mcompassionate[0m [93muse[0m [93mdatabase[0m ([93m2020[0m-[93m2024[0m) were [93manonymized[0m and [93manalyzed[0m. [93mDuplicates[0m were [93mremoved[0m, and a [93mpivot[0m [93mtable[0m was [93mused[0m to [93massess[0m [93mfactors[0m [93msuch[0m as [93mactive[0m [93mingredients[0m, [93mindications[0m, [93mtreatment[0m [93mcounts[0m, and [93mpatient[0m [93mdemographics[0m. [93mResults[0m were [93mpresented[0m as [93mcounts[0m and [93mpercentages[0m, with [93mtreatments[0m over [93m0[0m.[93m5[0m% of the [93mtotal[0m [93mclassified[0m as [93mcommon[0m. [93mStatistical[0m [93manalyses[0m [93mincluded[0m [93mStudent[0m'[93ms[0m [93mt[0m-[93mtest[0m and [93mchi[0m-[93msquared[0m [93mtest[0m for [93msubgroup[0m [93mdifferences[0m ([93mp[0m < [93m0[0m.[93m05[0m [93msignificant[0m). [93mCommonly[0m [93mused[0m [93mmedicinal[0m [93mproducts[0m were [93mcross[0m-[93mreferenced[0m with the [93mMOH[0m [93mdrug[0m [93mdatabase[0m for [93mregistration[0m and [93mreimbursement[0m [93mstatus[0m. [93mResults[0m: A [93mtotal[0m of [93m3[0m,[93m284[0m [93mcompassionate[0m [93mtreatments[0m were [93madministered[0m, [93memploying[0m [93m596[0m [93mdistinct[0m [93mmedicinal[0m [93mproducts[0m to [93maddress[0m [93m1[0m,[93m361[0m [93mconditions[0m in [93m2020[0m-[93m2024[0m. [93mTemporal[0m [93manalysis[0m [93midentified[0m a [93mpeak[0m in [93m2020[0m, which [93maccounted[0m for [93m24[0m% of [93mtotal[0m [93mtreatments[0m, [93mfollowed[0m by a [93mdecrease[0m [93mthereafter[0m. [93mPatient[0m [93mage[0m [93mstratification[0m [93mindicated[0m that those [93maged[0m [93m65[0m to [93m80[0m [93mreceived[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mtreatment[0m [93mproportion[0m ([93m26[0m%), while the [93m45[0m to [93m65[0m [93mage[0m [93mgroup[0m [93maccounted[0m for [93m19[0m%. [93mTreatments[0m were [93mmainly[0m [93mconcentrated[0m in [93mlarge[0m [93mcentral[0m [93mhospitals[0m ([93m77[0m%) and the [93mcentral[0m [93mdistrict[0m ([93m49[0m%), with the [93msouthern[0m [93mdistrict[0m [93mshowing[0m the [93mleast[0m [93musage[0m. The [93mauthorization[0m [93mprocess[0m was [93mprimarily[0m for the [93mcontinuation[0m of [93mstudy[0m [93mdrug[0m in [93m63[0m% of [93mcases[0m. [93mAdditionally[0m, [93mBelantamab[0m [93mmafodotin[0m and [93mTrametinib[0m were the [93mmost[0m [93mfrequently[0m [93mutilized[0m [93mmedicinal[0m [93mproducts[0m, [93maccounting[0m for [93m9[0m% and [93m8[0m.[93m6[0m% of [93mtreatments[0m, [93mrespectively[0m. [93mDisease[0m [93mcategory[0m [93manalysis[0m [93mrevealed[0m that [93mrelapsed[0m [93mrefractory[0m [93mmultiple[0m [93mmyeloma[0m, [93mcentral[0m [93mnervous[0m [92msystem[0m [93mtumors[0m, and [93minflammatory[0m [93mbowel[0m [93mdisease[0m were among the [93mtop[0m [93mconditions[0m [93mtreated[0m, [93mvarying[0m by [93mage[0m [93mgroup[0m. [93mNotably[0m, [93m60[0m% of the [93mmost[0m [93mcommon[0m [93mtechnologies[0m ([93m13[0m out of [93m22[0m) were [93msubsequently[0m [93mincluded[0m into the [93mnational[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mbasket[0m, [93mtypically[0m [93mfollowing[0m an [93mextended[0m [93mperiod[0m of [93mcompassionate[0m [93muse[0m that [93mexceeded[0m [93mtwo[0m [93myears[0m. [93mConclusion[0m: The [93mstudy[0m [93msuggests[0m that [93mIsrael[0m'[93ms[0m [93mcompassionate[0m [93muse[0m [93mprograms[0m [93mhave[0m [93maccelerated[0m [93mearly[0m [93maccess[0m to [93mnovel[0m [93mtherapies[0m for [93mcomplex[0m [93mconditions[0m and [93mprovided[0m a [93mbridge[0m to the [93minclusion[0m of [93mnovel[0m [93mmedicinal[0m [93mproducts[0m in the [93mnational[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mbasket[0m. [93mNonetheless[0m, the [93mstudy[0m [93midentifies[0m a [93mconcerning[0m [93mdownward[0m [93mtrend[0m in [93mutilization[0m [93malongside[0m [93mpotential[0m [93maccess[0m [93mdisparities[0m, [93mthereby[0m [93munderscoring[0m the [93mnecessity[0m for [93mfurther[0m [93mtargeted[0m [93minvestigations[0m.
